channel.title: [667] Helppp Max cash turns into 1 gp!
channel.description:
Problem 1 : How can i change the amount of money npcs drop. They only drop like 30k - 1m max so how would I change that?
Problem 2 : When someone goes over the default max cash which is 2147m it automatically turns into 1 coin if you add something to it.
Thank you for any help provided.
